io

Class FileIOModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.FileIOModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    I_FileReader, I_FileWriter

    public final class FileIOModule
extends java.lang.Object
implements I_FileReader, I_FileWriter
    Module that handles file IO.
    Since:
    09/12/2019
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    jacob.watson

      • writeToFile

        public final boolean writeToFile(java.io.File file,
                                 java.lang.String fileContent)
                          throws FileIOException
        Description copied from interface: I_FileWriter
        Writes the given fileContent to the given file. The contents of the file will be overridden with this method.
        Specified by:
        writeToFile in interface I_FileWriter
        Parameters:
        file - The file that needs to be modified.
        fileContent - The value of the content of the file.
        Returns:
        Returns whether the file was successfully written to.
        Throws:
        FileIOException - Thrown if there is an issue writing to the file, or if the given file is null. Also thrown if the given fileContent is null.

      • openFile

        Specified by:
        openFile in interface I_FileReader
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path that leads to the desired file.
        Returns:
        Returns the file that is located at the given path.
        Throws:
        FileIOException - Thrown if there is an issue opening the file, or if the given filePath is either empty or null.
